name: Backpackers Imperial Hotel
description:
According to guest reviews the Backpackers Imperial Hotel has “super comfy beds” and is situated in “such a great location”. 

The Backpackers Imperial Hotel is located in the heart of the Hobart CBD. We are within walking distance from the famous Salamanca Place and Market, the waterfront, parks, museums, shopping, cafes, pubs and restaurants. The Tourist Information Centre, supermarket, banks as well as public transport are also just a stone’s throw away. 

We are on levels one to three upstairs in the old Imperial Arcade which is a piece of Hobart’s Victorian architecture, first established in 1870.

We offer a variety of private and dorm rooms for the budget traveler. We boast the comfiest mattresses in town and we provide the beds fully made up for you on your arrival. We have spacious common areas with lounges and widescreen TVs, Netflix as well as a large clean kitchen and dining room to cook and enjoy your meals. 

Our friendly staff is looking forward to helping you enjoy your stay with us and in Hobart. 

Amenities:
* Located right in the “Centre of the City”
* 50 m from public transport
* Free Wifi
* Two spacious lounge areas
* Pool table, board games, book exchange
* TV & Netflix
* Fully equipped kitchen & dining area
* Multiple shared bathrooms (separate female/male), recently renovated
* Linen provided, beds made up on arrival
* Towel hire, $2 each, free towels for private room bookings (on request)
* Lockers in room for each guest (own padlock required)
* Laundry facilities (extra charge)
* Luggage storage (free for up to 48h after check-out)
* Free city street parking overnight
* Multi-storey secure car park next door (extra charge)
* Late night entrance
* 24 h on-site security manager, CCTV

* We currently do offer discounted rates for a minimum stay of 4 weeks, just ask our reception for more information.

Group Bookings: Any bookings for five or more guests traveling together is considered as a group booking. Please contact us directly by phone or email prior to the booking (otherwise your booking may not be accepted). A security deposit of $100 per person is mandatory.

Check-In: At your check-in you will be asked to provide the credit card of the booking/a credit card in the guests' name and government issued photo identification (e.g. passport, driver's license). Check-in is available after 1:00 PM. Reception closes at 2:30 PM. If you require a late check-in after 2:30 PM please call 24 hours before your arrival. Check-ins must be before 3 PM and payment in full will be required prior to arriving. 
**Key drop box for late check ins at Night Entry door.****

Security Deposit: It is at our discretion to ask for a key/room deposit on check-in.

Minimum Age: Please note the guests' minimum age for staying at our Backpackers is 18 years.

The hostel does not have a car park. However, there is a secure car park located 100 m from the property (fees apply). Parking on the street is free overnight.

Please provide your contact number while you made a booking, we reserve to cancel your booking without any notification and refund for any bookings without a valid contact number.

groupInformation.terms: Once you have booked online we will be in contact to confirm room allocation and other matters.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms: First night's accommodation is not refundable. Other nights will be refunded if cancelled more than 48 hours before check-in date.
groupInformation.additionalTerms: A $500 to $1,000 security bond is required depending on the size of the group. This security bond can be paid by cash or credit card on arrival and will be refunded after check-out.

houseRules.notes:
Check-In: At your check-in you will be asked to provide the credit card of the booking/a credit card in the guests' name and government issued photo identification (e.g. passport, drivers license). Check-in is available after 1.00 PM. Reception closes at 8.00 PM. If you require a late check-in after 8:00 PM please call 24 hours before your arrival. Check-ins must be before 11:59 PM and payment in full will be required prior to arriving. A $40 late call-out fee applies after 12 AM.

Security Deposit: It is at our discretion to ask for a key/room deposit on check-in.

Group Bookings: Any bookings for five or more guests traveling together is considered as a group booking. Please contact us directly by phone or email prior to the booking (otherwise your booking may not be accepted). A security deposit of $100 per person is mandatory.

Minimum Age: Please note the guests' minimum age for staying at our Backpackers is 18 years.

The hostel does not have a car park. However, there is a secure car park located 100 m from the property (fees apply). Parking on the street is free overnight.

Please provide your contact number while you made a booking, we reserve to cancel your booking without any notification and refund for any bookings without a valid contact number.
